data.eml:eml: Description of a new Brazilian Paraportanus and key to the species of the genus (Insecta, Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Portanini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carvalho, Adenomar Neves de (2012): Description of a new Brazilian Paraportanus and key to the species of the genus (Insecta, Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Portanini). ZooKeys 242: 19-24, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.242.3528, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.242.3528
